document_data.name: Rosetouch
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rosetouch''''' was a [[spell]] that was commonly used by [[cleric]]s of [[Lathander]].
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed a caster to repair any single item. When cast, the caster's hand emitted a brilliant rose light. The caster then touched a specific item to repair. The spell could also be used to mend injuries but it could not restore life-force. As the item was being mended, the rose light pulsed until the item was repaired. This spell could not be used to restore magical properties to a [[magical item]] or [[weapon]].
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
